description.text: A master of summoning creatures and controlling telekinetic forces through the ancient library of Eldingar.

feature.name: Summon: Booklings
feature.text: Summon two flying booklings with basic slashing abilities. AC: 12, HP: 10, Speed: 30 ft fly, Attack: +4 to hit, 1d4 slashing.

feature.name: Librarian's Waste
feature.text: Summon 15 gallons of glowing ink. You can telekinetically control the ink like a novice hydromancer.

feature.name: Master of Languages
feature.text: Instantly learn any language by reading the appropriate reference materials. Can be used once per day.

feature.name: Enigmatic Authorship
feature.text: Encrypt any message, allowing only the intended recipient or another Eldingar Archivist to read it.

feature.name: Summon: Seering Specter
feature.text: Summon a specter that detects magical items and effects within 50 ft. AC: 13, HP: 18, Speed: 20 ft fly.

feature.name: Prism of the Deceitful
feature.text: Create a doppelganger that mimics your appearance for up to 1 minute. It has AC 10, HP 1, and disappears after 1 hit or when concentration is lost.

feature.name: Ability Score Improvement
feature.text: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. You cannot increase an ability score above 20.

feature.name: Eldingar's Mantle
feature.text: Grants resistance to psychomantic (mental) attacks based on your level. Experts resist expert-level psychomancers, Masters resist master-level psychomancers.

feature.name: Extrasensory Perception
feature.text: You gain a 15-foot radius of 360-degree vision, granting a +2 bonus to passive Perception and immunity to being surprised.

feature.name: Librarian's Waste Upgrade
feature.text: You can now summon 25 gallons of ink and control it with intermediate proficiency. It blinds targets on a successful attack, and deals 1d6 acid damage.

feature.name: Orb of The Headmaster Scribe
feature.text: Temporarily gain proficiency in two skills (Medicine, Alchemy, or Nature) for 1 hour. Knowledge fades after use.

feature.name: Summon: Ayrliax Crawlers
feature.text: Summon Arachnoid creatures with web-shooting and toxic spit abilities. AC: 14, HP: 24, Web restrains, Spit deals 2d6 acid damage.

feature.name: Overwhelm
feature.text: Twice per day, stun two targets within 30 feet for 1d4 rounds. Overwhelms their minds with forbidden knowledge. DC = Spell Save DC, Intelligence save.

feature.name: Ability Score Improvement
feature.text: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. You cannot increase an ability score above 20.

feature.name: Runic Development
feature.text: Gain proficiency with runecasting. You can now read and understand all magical runes as a trained runecaster.

feature.name: Librarian's Waste Upgrade (Master)
feature.text: Summon 50 gallons of ink with expert control. You can blind creatures for 1d6 rounds or deal 2d6 acid damage.

feature.name: Foresight of Knowledge
feature.text: Add your Intelligence modifier to your initiative rolls in addition to your Dexterity modifier.

feature.name: Ring of the Arcane Mages
feature.text: Gain access to Pyromancy, Hydromancy, or Herbomancy at Expert level. You can cast 3 spells per day with the ring, but consecutive spells cause 1 level of exhaustion.

feature.name: Ability Score Improvement
feature.text: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. You cannot increase an ability score above 20.

feature.name: Ez'gins Old Knowledge
feature.text: Create a 35-foot telekinetic field, allowing you to choke, throw, or crush enemies. Deals 3d6 telekinetic damage on a failed Strength save (DC = Spell Save DC).

feature.name: Ability Score Improvement
feature.text: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. You cannot increase an ability score above 20.

feature.name: The Divine Coronation
feature.text: Disable one Master-level caster for 1 minute and gain true sight for the duration. Weaken Archmancers with disadvantage on their attack rolls.

feature.name: Ability Score Improvement
feature.text: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. You cannot increase an ability score above 20.

feature.name: Summon: Augur of Souls
feature.text: Summon a giant floating eye that freezes enemies within 15 ft and reads their memories. Failing a Wisdom save results in being paralyzed for 1 round. Augur can deal 2d10 force damage if mind-reading fails.

feature.name: Transcendent Voice
feature.text: Cast spells using only verbal components, speeding up casting time and making your spells harder to counterspell (casters have disadvantage on counterspelling you).

feature.name: Ability Score Improvement
feature.text: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. You cannot increase an ability score above 20.

feature.name: Librarian's Waste Upgrade (Oracle)
feature.text: Summon 100 gallons of ink with master control. You can blind creatures for 2d4 rounds or deal 3d6 acid damage.

feature.name: Ez'gins Old Knowledge (Upgrade)
feature.text: Increase the range of your telekinetic field to 50 feet. Lift and crush larger objects and deal 4d6 telekinetic damage.

resource.name: Summon Points
resource.description: Points used to fuel summoning abilities.
